entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • system.globalization.tests.idnmappingidnaconformancetests.getascii_invalid #72749
  • Random System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException in HttpListener #72748
  • JIT/Intrinsics/MemoryMarshalGetArrayDataReference from #72725 fails on Mono JIT #72745
  • JIT should track single-BB locals and multi-BB locals separately #72740
  • [HTTP/3] Stress QUIC mangled data #72739
    7.0.0
  • Regex generator with large pattern scalability, RyuJIT vs. NativeAOT #72730

Closed

  • Expression SwitchTests failing on Windows x86 release #72737
    7.0.0
  • Test Infrastructure Failure: System.IO.IOException: Unknown error 42424 #70079
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] Loopback server should dispose underlying QUIC connection #57779
    7.0.0
  • Creating StringBuilder with large initial capacity has regressed #59142
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve String.EndsWith for OrdinalIgnoreCase #72750
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V2 #72744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Detect truncated GZip streams (#61768)" #72742
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • TryAddWithoutValidation ViaHeaderValue #72741
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Fix ARM64 Unix debugging #72736
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix ARM64 Unix debugging #72735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Include dynamic methods in stacktrace #72732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix generation of LLVM IR for OP_SSE_CVTII. #72731
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1900619 #72729
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix missing shifting of Match._textxx fields #72728
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Avoid some unnecessary static readonly arrays #72727
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Replace a static readonly int[] in System.Data.Common #72743
    area-System.Data, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress error System.Exception: Completed unexpectedly #72734
    area-System.Net
  • Avoid unnecessary return val copying in tailcall-via-help #72720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Consolidate importer spilling code (#72291)" #72738
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix nativeaot arm64 build on macOS #72733
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Return connection dispose in H3loopback connection #72713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix typos #72709
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add EH filters for generic catch(T) blocks #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid a couple theoretical reorderings in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #72657
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Re-create MultiCoreJIT profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Fix ReflectionCachesUpdateHandler_CachesCleared test in aggressive trim mode #72682
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Simplify UpgradeToRegexGenerator #72538
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add CertificateRevocationListBuilder #72708
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Bail ThreadAbort redirection after catch handlers on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Remove connection state from QuicStream #72599
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Finds logger field in related types #71308
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection
  • Expands a list of always trimmed mobile+web CA with few recently added #72678
    area-CoreLib-mono, linkable-framework
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fixed HWIntrinsic reflection bug with `NextCallReturnAddress` intrinsic #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid transformation from multiplication to left shift in case of 64 bit value #71189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.GetDatePart()` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Add SqlTypes apis for SqlClient #72724
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SARIF 2.1.0 §3.27.23 violation: Only suppressed results have a `suppressions` property #62894

Closed

  • Add speedometer tests for Roslyn features #57607
    17.3
  • Interpolated string isn't evaluated constantly when mixed with variables #62892

PullRequests

Created

  • Features/decon switch target typing #62896
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Derive unnecessary imports analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62895
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded SupportedDiagnostics override #62893
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #62888
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #62887
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62891
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62889
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62890
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: endpoint, updates #42886

Closed

  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #42885
  • aspnetcore Abnormal prompt during operation #42647

    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't publish BlazorWinFormsApp or BlazorWpfApp BlazorWebView samples with ClickOnce #8967
  • Spelling Mistake in FlexLayout AlignContent options. #8966
  • There is no way to set the text color of a Switch control #8965
  • Two presses of the Tab key are required to move keyboard focus away from a CollectionView item that has a semantic description #8964
  • Two presses of the Tab key are required to move keyboard focus from the Open Navigation button to the first focusable control that follows it #8963
  • Button BackgroundColor does not change with IsEnabled State on Release to Device Only #8961
  • Entry.Completed and Entry.ReturnCommand not executed #8960

Closed

  • Selamat #8959

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add Admin check for removing needs-info labels #8933
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Non shell aot #8941
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
